name: eCare4YouIDD
0:
”Alexa, launch smart caring”
”Alexa, launch smart caring and start survey”
”Alexa, launch smart caring and fetch reminders”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart caring
Developer Terms of Use
des:
ArtemisCare's eCare4You IDD skill offers an easy to use interface that enables individuals with intellectual challenges to 
1. Respond to questions about their daily tasks and activities
2. Ask their care giver to contact them (THIS IS NOT ASKING FOR EMERGENCY HELP OR 911)
This Alexa skill is to be used with Artemis Care Inc. member portal to get all the benefits of the Artemis Care remote care solution. Artemis Care eCare4You IDD platform is designed for members with chronic conditions or intellectual disabilities to take better care of their health through regular reminders, check ins and health data gathering. The ultimate goal is to allow the members to live independent and dignified lives.

The use of easy to use technologies like Alexa and intuitive mobile apps make eCare4You IDD platform uniquely qualified to serve the individuals with intellectual disabilities or disorders (IDD) Working with Alexa is as simple as having a conversation with your loved one. 

This skill is currently available in English with more languages to be added in the future. The skill is not designed to be used with any PHI data and should be used only for reminders about their daily tasks and activities.

This skill requires account linking with the ArtemisCare eCare4You IDD member account for it to work. Please contact info@artemiscareinc.com on how to get a member account setup in SmartCare member portal.
